Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29402952] Gram-positive bacteria:Listeria monocytogenes (MIC=23.1±8.1 μg/mL);Gram-negative bacterium:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=16±0 μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The peptide adopts a random coil structure in water and presented an orders alpha-helix structure with 84.2 % alpha-helices in 30?mM SDS
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.  H5(61

Literature.Title: Histone H5 is a potent Antimicrobial Agent and a template for novel Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Jodoin J, Hincke MT.
